data.name: HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Venture into the vibrant and colorful world of Hypercharge: Unboxed through the original in-game soundtrack. It contains 29 full tracks with a listening time of over 2 hours.
data.about_the_game: Venture into the vibrant and colorful world of Hypercharge: Unboxed through the original in-game soundtrack. It contains 29 full tracks with a listening time of over 2 hours.
data.short_description: Original Soundtrack of the game Hypercharge: Unboxed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1000 MB available space
